item.title: Android Input Validation Using Regular Expressions
item.description: A regular expression is a string containing a combination of normal characters and special metacharacters or sequences. They are used to search through, manipulate, edit and filter text. We are going to use it for pattern matching on the client side in android using kotlin. Prerequisites Going forward I am going to assume you know how to: Setup a basic android project Add google’s material design dependency Create basic text input layouts for email, username and password.
